Menu Home Course List Practice History Settings
About App Version %s An open-source app to help you improve your speaking skills with daily practice and feedback. Contact Us Privacy Policy Your practice data and recordings are stored only on this device and will be lost if the app is uninstalled. App Logo Source Code https://github.com/your_username/speechmaster Apache License 2.0 https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 View %s Report Issue / Feedback imroybox@gmail.com
Privacy Policy

Last updated: [Date]

SpeechMaster ("us", "we", or "our") operates the SpeechMaster mobile application (the "Service"). This is an open-source application designed for learning and practice.

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.

Data Storage:
All data you generate within the application, including course progress, user-created content, and audio recordings, is stored solely on your local device. We do not collect or transmit this data to any external servers.

Audio Recordings:
Audio recordings are created when you use the practice feature. These recordings are temporarily stored on your device for the sole purpose of analysis by a third-party speech assessment service (Microsoft Azure Speech Services is configured by default, requiring you to provide your own API keys in the build configuration if you compile the app yourself). Recordings are sent securely to the configured service for analysis and are typically deleted from your device after analysis or when you manually reset a recording. We do not store your recordings long-term.

Third-Party Services:
We use third-party services like Microsoft Azure Speech Services for pronunciation assessment. These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of data. We only send the necessary audio data and reference text for analysis using the API keys you may provide during compilation.

Permissions:
The application requires the RECORD_AUDIO permission to capture audio for practice sessions. This permission is only used when you actively initiate a recording.

Data Deletion:
Uninstalling the application will permanently delete all associated data from your device.

Changes to This Privacy Policy:
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

Contact Us / Issues:
Please report any issues or provide feedback via the project's repository issue tracker linked on the About screen.
